title: 求教betonquest的目标中位置的设置
author: DIVER
txt_content:
我按照论坛内http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=676918这个帖子来设置。结果后台报错.连和NPC都无法对话当我后面不加条件和事件时：location 68;67;244;world;5
报错是这样的：[09.05.2018 15:39:58] ERROR: Error in 'default.寻找路牌a' objective (location): Not enough arguments
当我后面加了条件或事件时：location 68;67;244;world;5 condition:xs寻找路牌q events:定点任务提醒
报错是这样:[09.05.2018 15:19:56] ERROR: Error in 'default.寻找路牌a' objective (location): Error while parsing 2 argument: Could not parse a number: For input string: "events:定点任务提醒"

以及这样的:[09.05.2018 14:56:01] ERROR: Error in 'default.寻找路牌a' objective (location): Error while parsing 2 argument: Could not parse a number: For input string: "condition:xs寻找路牌q"

跪求大神帮忙,这个问题困扰我两天多了！
